arm_group.description: OCZ103-OS in combination with Platinum-Gemcitabine as standard of care

brief_summary.textblock:
The purpose of this study is to investigate the safety and efficacy of the use of OCZ103-OS
      in combination with Platinum-Gemcitabine based doublet first line therapy in stage IV
      non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) patients.

clinical_study.brief_title: An Exploratory Study of OCZ103-OS in Combination With Standard of Care in Stage IV Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) Patients

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a single arm, open label study to investigate the safety and efficacy of the use of
      OCZ103-OS in combination with Platinum-gemcitabine base doublet first line therapy in stage
      IV non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) patients.

intervention.description: OCZ103-OS is given in combination with chemotherapy each cycle
Platinum is given as standard chemotherapy each cycle
Gemcitabine is given as standard chemotherapy each cycle

keyword: platinum-gemcitabine based doublet first line therapy
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase IIa Exploratory Study of OCZ103-OS in Combination With Platinum-Gemcitabine Based Doublet First Line Therapy in Stage IV Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer (NSCLC) Patients

overall_official.affiliation: Wojewodzki Szpital Specjalistyczny im .M. Kopernika w

oversight_info.authority: Poland: Office for Registration of Medicinal Products, Medical devices, and Biological Products

primary_outcome.description: To assess the effect of OCZ103-OS on overall objective response in subjects with stage IV non-small cell lung cancer.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Endpoint Classification: Safety/Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Single Group Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
